properties.description: Transfers the allocation data from CH to Transform_DB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	Allocations.[AL_DET_REF]
	,Allocations.[AL_ACCOUNT] AS AccNo
	,Allocations.[AL_CREDATT] AS CreatedAt
	,Allocations.[AL_DATE] AS TransactionDate
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYDAY] AS DateAllocated
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYIND]
	,Allocations.[AL_POSTREF] AS POST_REF
	,Allocations.[AL_REF1] AS Reference1
	,Allocations.[AL_REF2] AS Reference2
	,Allocations.[AL_TYPE] 
	,CASE 
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'A' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment - User'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'R' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'N' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType
	,Allocations.[AL_VAL] AS AllocationValue
	,Allocations.[MEMO] AS AllocationMemo
FROM 
	InvAlloc AS Allocations WITH (NOLOCK)

SELECT 
    Site.SiteId
	,Site.SiteName
	,Profiles.Pro_code AS profile_code
    ,Profiles.Prodesc AS profile_description
    ,Chsysdec.Description AS account_type
    ,Profiles.Pro_ref
    ,Profiles.Billdays AS bill_days_or_nights
    ,Profiles.Billdeath AS bill_day_of_death
    ,Profiles.Billdod AS bill_day_of_discharge
    ,Profiles.Billdoa AS bill_day_of_admission
    ,Profiles.Invprint
    ,Profiles.Invdoc
    ,Profiles.Soflag AS standing_order
    ,Profiles.Noticeper AS notice_period
    ,Profiles.Nperanal AS notice_period_analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Npervatr AS notice_period_vat_code
    ,Profiles.Defrate AS default_charge_rate
    ,Profiles.Chgper AS charge_period
    ,Profiles.Feesanal AS analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Feesdesc AS fees_description
    ,Profiles.FeesVatC AS vat_code
    ,Profiles.BillAbs AS bill_while_temp_absent
    ,Profiles.Autocredit AS automatic_credit
    ,Profiles.PenBooks AS attach_pension_books
    ,Profiles.UserMemo
    ,Profiles.NoInvDec
    ,Profiles.sg_BankAcc
    ,Profiles.UseFlag
    ,Profiles.OOSExtraContrib

FROM 
	Profiles (NOLOCK)

    JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK) -- Lookup table for values?
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Profiles.FsType

    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Profiles.Pro_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'PROFILES'
                            )
           OR Profiles.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Profiles.FSTYPE = 401 --Local Auth
	--AND Site.SITEID IN (
	--071,
--072,
--073,
--074,
--075,
--078,
--079,
--086,
--089,
--088,
--091,
--092,
--090,
--095,
--096,
--097,
--098,
--099,
--100,
--101,
--102,
--103,
--104,
--105,
--106,
--107,
--108,
--109,
--110,
--111,
--112,
--113,
--114,
--115,
--116,
--117,
--118,
--119,
--120,
--121,
--122,
--123,
--127,
--128
--)

SELECT 
    H.Home_Ref
    --,P.SiteId
    ,SiteName
    ,profile_code
    ,profile_description
    ,account_type
    ,Pro_ref
    ,bill_days_or_nights
    ,bill_day_of_death
    ,bill_day_of_discharge
    ,bill_day_of_admission
    --,Invprint
    --,Invdoc
    ,standing_order
    ,notice_period
    ,notice_period_analysis_code
    ,notice_period_vat_code
    ,default_charge_rate
    ,charge_period
    ,analysis_code
    ,fees_description
    ,vat_code
    ,bill_while_temp_absent
    ,automatic_credit
    ,attach_pension_books
    --,UserMemo
    --,NoInvDec
    ,sg_BankAcc
    --,UseFlag
    --,OOSExtraContrib
FROM 
    dbo.LocalAuthProfiles AS P

    LEFT JOIN ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = P.SiteId

properties.description: Copies the posted transactions from On Prem CH to Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	InvPosting.POST_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	P.PRODESC AS AccProfile,
	CONCAT(RTRIM(CONTACT.FORENAMES), RTRIM(CONTACT.SURNAME)) AS FundSourceName,
	InvPosting.account_No AS AccNo, 
	R.RES_CODE AS RES_CODE,
	InvPosting.CRE_DATET AS CreatedAt,
	InvPosting.DUE_DATE AS DueDate,
	InvPosting.INV_DATE AS TransactionDate,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt - To account'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'R' THEN 'Receipt - To transaction'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS Reference1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS Reference2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS TransactionValue, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS TransactionBalance
	,INVPOSTING.TRAN_TYPE
FROM 
	InvPosting WITH (NOLOCK)
	
	LEFT JOIN FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON ACC.ACCNO = InvPosting.ACCOUNT_NO
		AND ACC.ENDDATE IS NULL

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT WITH (NOLOCK) 
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF

	LEFT JOIN Site WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

SELECT
    STGPostedTransactions.POST_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteID
    ,HOME.HOME_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccProfile
    ,STGPostedTransactions.FundSourceName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccNo
    ,STGPostedTransactions.RES_CODE
    ,STGPostedTransactions.CreatedAt
    ,STGPostedTransactions.DueDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionType
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference1
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference2
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionValue
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionBalance
FROM 
    ColdHarbour.STGPostedTransactions

    LEFT JOIN GRG.HOME
        ON HOME.SiteID = STGPostedTransactions.SiteID

properties.description: Runs pipelines to copy files from file share, then process them into SQL tables.
Copies the Parquet files from the Azure file share to Azure blob storage. Then copies data from the files and loads into the TRANSFROM_DB. Everyday at 3pm

properties.description: Copies the resident diary entries from CH to AH2 Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	Resident_Dy.RES_DY_REF,
	Resident_Dy.RES_REF,
	R.RES_CODE,
    ChSysDec.Description AS EntryType,
    CAST(Resident_Dy.Entry_Date AS DATE) AS EntryDate,
	CAST(Resident_Dy.Review_Date AS DATE) AS ReviewDate,
    replace(cast(Resident_Dy.Entry_Text as varchar(MAX)), char(13) + char(10), ' ') AS DiaryEntry,
    isnull(User_Hd.Name, '') AS EnteredBy
FROM 
    Resident_Dy (NOLOCK)
    
    LEFT JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK)
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Resident_Dy.Entry_Type
        
    LEFT JOIN User_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON User_Hd.User_Ref = Resident_Dy.User_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = Resident_Dy.RES_REF

properties.description: Home IDs for CH IP and GRG

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT HOME_ID, HOME_NAME, HOME_REF FROM dbo.HOME
ORDER BY 1 ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[ADANAL_DEC]
      ,[ADDRESS1]
      ,[ADDRESS2]
      ,[ADDRESS3]
      ,[ADDRESS4]
      ,[ADMSN_ANAL]
      ,[ADMSN_TYPE]
      ,[ADM_REASON]
      ,[ADTYP_DEC]
      ,[ANAL_GROUP]
      ,[AUTHORITY]
      ,R.[AmendDateTime]
      ,[BIRTHDATE]
      ,[CARECAT]
      ,[CONTSIGNED]
      ,R.[CreateDateTime]
      ,[DISABILITY]
      ,[ENQ_REF]
      ,[HOME]
      ,R.[HOME_REF]
      ,[LASTADDATE]
      ,[LASTDIDATE]
      ,[LOC_DESC]
      ,[LOC_REF]
      ,[MARKETING]
      ,[NINUMBER]
      ,[OCC_IGNORE]
      ,[ORES_REF]
      ,[ORIGADDATE]
      ,[POSTCODE]
      ,[RELIGION]
      ,[RESPAYINT]
      ,[RES_CODE]
      ,[RES_FNAME]
      ,[RES_REF]
      ,[RES_SNAME]
      ,[ROOM]
      ,[ROOMCAT]
      ,[ROOM_DESC]
      ,[ROOM_TYPE]
      ,[SEX]
      ,[STATUS]
      ,[TEL_NO1]
      ,[TEL_NO2]
      ,[TITLE]
      ,[USERDEF]
      ,[AUTHCODE]
      ,[DOUBLEINS]
      ,[FIRSTAWARE]
      ,[FIRSTVISIT]
      ,[REAL_FNAME]
      ,[REAL_SNAME]
      ,[REAL_TITLE]
      ,[SIGIND]
      ,[THIRDPARTY]
      ,[USERFIELD1]
      ,[USERFIELD2]
      ,[USERFIELD3]
      ,[NHSNUMBER]
      ,[ALTCOMMS]
      ,[ALTCOMMS_REF]
      ,[ASS_ACTBY]
      ,[ASS_ACTBY_REF]
      ,[ASS_ACTDT]
      ,[CONNECTION]
      ,[CONNECTIONDET]
      ,[CONNECTION_REF]
      ,[FUNDERREF]
      ,[LANGUAGE]
      ,[LANGUAGE_REF]
      ,[MOVEDINFROM]
      ,[MOVEDINFROM_REF]
      ,[PATIENTREF]
      ,[PICID]
      ,[PREVCODE]
  FROM [AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[RESIDENT] AS R

  WHERE
	R.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')}) --Home_ref List of homes being used in CH. Excludes any old ones being brought in
    AND RES_CODE NOT IN ('HH0048', 'HH0051', 'HH0055', 'HH0060', 'HH0063', 'HH0064', 'HH0066') --Orphaned records in GRG for residents not present in CH
  ORDER BY
	  R.RES_REF ASC

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT STRING_AGG(ColdHarbourHOME_REF, ',') AS HOME_REF_LIST FROM Avery.Home WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF IS NOT NULL

SELECT  
	R.[AmendDateTime]
    ,R.[CreateDateTime]
    ,R.[HOME_REF]
    ,R.[OLOC_REF]
    ,[OROOM_REF]
    ,[ROOM_CAT]
    ,[ROOM_CAT_DESC]
    ,[ROOM_CODE]
    ,[ROOM_DESC]
    ,[ROOM_NO_BEDS]
    ,[ROOM_REF]
    ,[ROOM_TYPE]
    ,[ROOM_TYPE_DESC]
    ,[CHARGEPERIOD]
    ,[CURRENTRATE]
    ,[RATEDATE]
    ,[ROOM_UDF1]
    ,[ROOM_UDF2]
    ,[ROOM_UDF3]
    ,[ROOM_UDF4]
    ,R.[USEFLAG]
FROM 
	[AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ROOMS] AS R
WHERE
	--R.AmendDateTime >= '2020-01-01'
	R.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY 
	ROOM_REF ASC

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT STRING_AGG(ColdHarbourHOME_REF, ',') AS HOME_REF_LIST FROM Avery.Home WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF IS NOT NULL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})
